title: 820-00165 only run from battery when U7100 heat up
message:
Got this board with water damage (lightly). PPBUS was 8.20 so i changed 8.60 and now it is turning on. After that the battery wasnt detected and ISL 17/18 wasnt ok, so i changed it too. 

Now when u7100 area is a little hot it is starting and detecting battery and run from battery, but if it is cold, the battery is detecting than not detecting ( on login screen it is changing from "X" on battery icon to 100% sometimes 1%, sometimes 7% every 2-3 seconds). 


P.S. SMC had been changed twice from donor good know board, ISL6529 first i installed new one, than take another from donor board.

title: 820-00165 only run from battery when U7100 heat up
820-00165 only run from battery when U7100 heat up
message: Check SCL/SDA lines of battery bus; voltage and diode mode to ground.

title: 820-00165 only run from battery when U7100 heat up
message:
Forget to tell that already checked R5380/81. Resistance are ok, and diode mode is 0.530 on both and voltage 3.42V (pulsing 3.42-3.44 every second)



Checked that when U7100 is hot and board run from battery, the diode mode is 0.480 . Any idea what does it mean?

title: 820-00165 only run from battery when U7100 heat up
message:
Magsafe light fluctuates?
Try known good LIO board/flex, just in case.

title: 820-00165 only run from battery when U7100 heat up
message: no, light is stable. Anyway when i try to run from battery i dont connect LIO board ( all procedure described was done without LIO board connected)

title: 820-00165 only run from battery when U7100 heat up
message: You must have LIO board connected, to charge the battery.

title: 820-00165 only run from battery when U7100 heat up
message: I am not trying to charge the battery. I try to run from battery. Anyway even conected and good known LIO the issue is the same. When board is hot it is working ok but when cold not running from battery

title: 820-00165 only run from battery when U7100 heat up
message: Any idea what can i check?

title: 820-00165 only run from battery when U7100 heat up
message:
Check power on sequence signals on battery alone.
Start with 3V42_G3H and PCH's RTC signals.
